properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 11:51AM CST until January 13 at 1:42AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Coldwater River and Little Tallahatchie Canal...

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany
* from Saturday January 11 until Sunday January 12.
* At 11 AM Saturday the stage was...22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 27.0 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday January 11 and
continue to rise to near 27.0 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage later on Sunday January 12.
At 28.0 feet, Crop land flooding is very extensive and water begins
to cover County Highway 46. County Highway 47 has 1 to 2 feet of
water over the unpaved portions. Evacuations become necessary due to
access problems.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
